name: INBookRestaurantReservationIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface booking a reservation that the user selected.

items.name: func resolveRestaurant(for: INBookRestaurantReservationIntent, completion: (INRestaurantResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the restaurant associated with the reservation.

items.name: func resolveBookingDateComponents(for: INBookRestaurantReservationIntent, completion: (INDateComponentsResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the date of the reservation.

items.name: func resolvePartySize(for: INBookRestaurantReservationIntent, completion: (INIntegerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the number of people in the user’s party.

items.name: func resolveGuest(for: INBookRestaurantReservationIntent, completion: (INRestaurantGuestResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the identity of the guest associated with the reservation.

items.name: func resolveGuestProvidedSpecialRequestText(for: INBookRestaurantReservationIntent, completion: (INStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves any special requests made in connection with the reservation.

items.name: func confirm(bookRestaurantReservation: INBookRestaurantReservationIntent, completion: (INBookRestaurantReservationIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can complete the reservation.
